keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lisa will fight for local schools to be fairly funded and stick up for local parents.
She believes in protecting public parks and delivering better air quality...
Lisa has a plan for homes that are really affordable for local people.
Lisa has a detailed plan to tackle crime...
